original_title: They All Laughed 25 Years Later: Director to Director - A Conversation with Peter Bogdanovich and Wes Anderson
overview: Filmmaker Wes Anderson interviews Peter Bogdanovich about "They All Laughed," the film Bogdanovich calls his personal best.
title: They All Laughed 25 Years Later: Director to Director - A Conversation with Peter Bogdanovich and Wes Anderson
